name: Bitter Bliss
preparation: In a shaker filled with ice, combine Everclear, chocolate milk, lemon juice, and a dash of Angostura bitters. Shake well until the mixture is chilled. Strain into a chilled sour glass.
backstory: Crafted to challenge the taste buds with a unique blend of high-proof alcohol and rich chocolate, balanced with a sour twist of lemon and aromatic bitters, evoking the daring spirit of experimental mixology.
